alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 5:49PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rankin, northeastern Warren, southern Yazoo, Hinds and Madison Counties through 700 PM CST... At 548 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tinsley to 6 miles northwest of Vicksburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Little Yazoo and Tinsley around 555 PM CST. Redwood and Myrleville around 600 PM CST. Bovina around 610 PM CST. Flowers and Youngton around 615 PM CST. Edwards around 620 PM CST. Way around 625 PM CST. Bolton and Sharon around 635 PM CST. Raymond around 640 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Satartia and Bentonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and central and west central Mississippi.
